comments.body: That would be very useful IMO

@spf3000 I feel that the `timezone` should be accessible on its own, so that I don't have to generate a new timestamp in trying to get it.

I wouldn't really say the information is duplicated. Rather, `timezone` is a primitive from which you construct a higher-order value, `currentDateTime`. The important thing is that one depends on the other.
